collectible.title: Crest of Goneril Brooch
collectible.subtitle: An accessory made by Hilda herself.
collectible.text: "Oh, here, you can have this. A little something to show from meeting an heir of Goneril. I made it myself, so don't lose it, okay?"

collectible.title: Decorative Axe
collectible.subtitle: A weapon that has spent more time in a trophy room than on the battlefield.
collectible.text:
This axe has never actually seen combat, it only exists to be shown off and look pretty. That may have something to do with why Hilda likes it so much.
(Special thanks to Nomelet for creating the axe head.)
collectible.unlock:
See Hilda "cheer herself on".
Start with six or fewer layers or play her with a certain narcissistic alchemist to improve your chances.
